title: What are the moral sources of history? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can tell you and show you, but Quora seems to be controlled by Muslim law that bans the Word of God from Jesus Christ. Quora also collapses the verses of moral hate and commands to kill for genocide of non Muslims. Pakistan 1950, Bangladesh 1971 back to 7th century. TABARI 9 VERSE 69.
“ Morality “ is dependent on the development of the culture which defines it. When you have a “ clash of cultures “, you’re basically talking about opposing morals and ethics.
